title: Today is Friday, June 25.  This afternoon I heard a series of loud booms from the direction of the river.  (I work downtown).  Was the Battleship North Carolina discharging its weapons?  (There is usually a heads-up notice circulated before that happens.)  Did Sunny Point explode?  What was that noise?
text:
There haven't been any reports of explosions or other incidents that
day, but there were some heavy thunderstorms in the area.
